overview: The baddest man on the planet. The multiple time heavyweight boxing champion of the world. 'Iron' Mike Tyson. Growing up, he struggled immensely. Inside the ring, he steamrolled an entire division of elite athletes. Take a look at the incredible journey Mike Tyson has been through and the demons he has faced to become one of the greatest boxers of all time.
title: Mike Tyson - Fists of Iron
